items.content_html: PressJS is a lightweight Content Management System (CMS) built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). It provides a user-friendly interface for managing digital content on the web. With user authentication, dynamic content types, and customization options, PressJS is designed to be versatile and easy to use.
items.title: BishwasGit/PressJS: PressJS is a lightweight Content Management System (CMS) built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). It provides a user-friendly interface for managing digital content on the web. With user authentication, dynamic content types, and customization options, PressJS is designed to be versatile and easy to use.
